#summary A command-line multi-system gaming emulator
#labels mednafen,emulator,sdl

|| Mednafen is a portable, utilizing OpenGL and SDL, argument(command-line)-driven multi-system emulator with many advanced features. The Atari Lynx, Game Boy (Color), Game Boy Advance, NES, PC Engine (TurboGrafx 16), SuperGrafx, Neo Geo Pocket (Color), PC-FX, and WonderSwan (Color) are emulated. || <wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H087lab5vTQ"/> ||
